alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Greenville Mountains; Pickens Mountains (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 3:25PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN TRANSYLVANIA... NORTHWESTERN GREENVILLE AND NORTH CENTRAL PICKENS COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM EDT... At 324 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Brevard, or near Caesars Head State Park. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Caesars Head State Park, Jones Gap State Park, Table Rock State Park, Cleveland, and Cedar Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Greenville Mountains; Pickens Mountains
